tool_description: Calculates astrological house positions using various house systems and determines which house each planetary position occupies.

latitude.description: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

house_system.description: House system: Placidus, Koch, Equal, Whole_Sign, Campanus

planet_names.description: Array of planet names corresponding to longitudes

error_messages: Coordinate range error: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude must be -180 to 180
Invalid house system: Use Placidus, Koch, Equal, Whole_Sign, or Campanus
Array mismatch: planet_longitudes and planet_names arrays must have same length
Invalid sidereal time: Must be between 0 and 24 hours
Invalid longitude values: All planet longitudes must be between 0 and 360 degrees
usage: Provide geographic coordinates, sidereal time, and arrays of planet positions. Optionally specify house system. Returns house cusps and planetary house positions.

house_cusps.description: Array of 12 house cusp positions in degrees

planetary_houses.description: Array of house numbers (1-12) for each planet
